tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Bioenergy_Research (
  researcher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  researcher_name VARCHAR(50),
  biofuel_used VARCHAR(50),
  greenhouse_gas_emissions FLOAT
)
CREATE TABLE BioenergyResearcher (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255), institution VARCHAR(255), research_field VARCHAR(255));
CREATE TABLE BiofuelsData (id INT PRIMARY KEY, date DATE, biofuel_type VARCHAR(255), greenhouse_gas_emissions DECIMAL(10, 2));
CREATE TABLE ResearcherConnections (id INT PRIMARY KEY, researcher_id INT, colleague_id INT);

CREATE TABLE ResearchResults (
    result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_id UUID NOT NULL,
    biofuel_id UUID NOT NULL,
    emission_id UUID NOT NULL,
    result_description TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE emissions (
    emission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    biofuel_id INT,
    researcher_id INT,
    emission_amount DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (biofuel_id) REFERENCES biofuels(biofuel_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (researcher_id) REFERENCES researchers(researcher_id)
);

CREATE TABLE gas_emissions (
    emission_id INT,
    gas_id INT,
    emission_value DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (emission_id) REFERENCES emissions(emission_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (gas_id) REFERENCES greenhouse_gases(gas_id)
);
